channel.title: llama3 on 丸子有记
channel.description: Recent content in llama3 on 丸子有记

item.title: Use ollama and open-webui to experience open source big models
item.author: wzdushu@gmail.com (wanzi)
item.description: It has been more than a year since the use of large models. From the initial chatgbt3.5/4 to the current domestic large models, open source large models are becoming more and more powerful, such as Llama, SD, etc. Today, I will introduce two tools that have been used for a long time, ollama and open-webui. Ollama Ollama is an open source deep learning framework designed for easy deployment and operation
